text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ese ntimubona ibigirwamana byanyu musenga bitari Allah? Nimunyereke icyo byaremye ku isi. Ese byaba byaragize uruhare mu iremwa ryâ€™ibirere, cyangwa ngo tube twarabahaye igitabo bakaba ari cyo bakomoramo ibimenyetso bigaragara bagenderaho? (Oya!) Ahubwo ibyo ababangikanyamana bamwe basezeranya abandi ni ibinyoma
